snippet.title: D-Virus: Evil Menace Itchio Trailer
snippet.description:
D-Virus is a short RPG made with RPG Maker MV to participate in the Major Jam, wich theme was Cosmic. But the team liked the project so much we ended working more on it! And now, an improved version is being made with a lot of extra content!

You can play D-Virus: Evil Menace right here on Itchio: https://ninjadalua.itch.io/dvirus
Or here on Gamejolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/dvirus/642469

Overall view
Playing as the rookie Melissa Casanova, you must use the power of your HERZ to fight against a devilish virus that spreaded through Wittelsbach spaceship. The HERZ is the only way to defeat these demons! With a turn-based combat system inspired by "Shin Megami Tensei" and "Tales of" series, exploit the enemies weaknesses to get the advantage in battle and achieve a high combo!

Sprites, Story and Programming: Cadu Pinheiro
Character arts and Enemy arts: @AC_Drawss (twitter)
Songs: @AudioTryhard (twitter)

--Redes sociais--
Pagina de artes do Face: https://www.facebook.com/DaLua-Artes-104848447699524/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/NinjaDaLua
